coding.title: Design Execution

coding.testimonial: "Scott not only creates phenomenal websites/prototypes from a coding perspective, but he also has a very keen visual design eye." ~ John Jones - Designer

coding.title: Efficient Coding
coding.description: I deliver lean, mean and clean front-end code that is ready for use in production environments and custom websites
coding.testimonial: "Scott was easy to work with, very open to trying alternate ideas and developing creative code options for, sometimes challenging, UI intent.  His collaboration was very much appreciated." ~ Lance Rogers - Creative Manager

coding.title: Team Asset
coding.description: I set the bar high for any team. My stamina and work horse mentality are a great asset to my teams success
coding.testimonial: "Scott consistently takes on challenging work that pushes the boundaries, raise concerns when/where needed, communicates up appropriately when there are constraints and is the first to jump in to help teammates when needed. Awesome work - keep it up!" ~ Geoff Laux - Product Owner

contact.specialNote: THANK YOU FOR VISITING! TO PUT IT SIMPLY, I LOVE BRINGING WEB PAGES TO LIFE. WHETHER I'M DOING FREELANCE WORK OR EMBEDDED INTO A PRODUCTION TEAM, MY STRONG PASSION FOR CODE KEEPS ME CONSTANTLY WANTING TO CONQUER THE DAILY CHALLENGES OF FRONT-END AND USER INTERFACE DEVELOPMENT
